ModMetaData.name: Blood Dries
ModMetaData.author: Izzimon
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>About</size> Blood that has splattered on the ground now steadily darkens as it dries up over a few days (if the temperature is above 0). It also gradually fades as it erodes.
I made this mod because I was getting frustrated by there being dessicated corpses surrounded by fresh blood dotted around the map (particularly when playing in a warm biome without much rain).
This is my first coding mod, so very open to feedback and suggestions.
<size=24>Compatibility</size> It doesn't break with "Blood Stains" (although you'll see dried blood footprints). It also works with "Brighter Blood" - I'd just recommend putting this mod after it in the load order, because it needed patching.
